0.2.0.name: typograph

readme:
## Atom Typograph Package for Atom: typographing text using [Typograf](https://github.com/typograf/typograf). ``` McFly — «Too loud»! I can't believe it... Jennifer — Marty, one rejection isn't the end of the world. ``` Press `CTRL+ALT+T`(`CTRL+SHIFT+T` for Russian language) and this text will be replaced by: ```

McFly — «Too loud»! I can’t believe it…
Jennifer — Marty, one rejection isn’t the end of the world.

``` If you press `CTRL+ALT+A`(`CTRL+SHIFT+A` for Russian language) html-tags will be excluded from text: ``` McFly — «Too loud»! I can’t believe it… Jennifer — Marty, one rejection isn’t the end of the world. ``` -----
